channel.title: OpenSCAD on J. Felipe Gonzalez, Ph.D.
channel.description: Recent content in OpenSCAD on J. Felipe Gonzalez, Ph.D.

item.title: Facilitating Programming-based 3D Computer-Aided Design using Bidirectional Programming
item.description: Hello, designer with a programming background in CAD! This project is all about making your 3D design experience smoother and more enjoyable, especially if you’re the kind of person who loves getting into the code. It’s based on my PhD thesis, which you can check out here. You know how most 3D CAD tools are pretty intuitive, with those drag-and-drop interfaces that let you tweak your designs with ease? Well, there’s another side to CAD—a programming-based approach.
